allow: Bash(if not exist config mkdir config)
Bash(if not exist src mkdir src)
Bash(if not exist srcingest mkdir srcingest)
Bash(if not exist srcextract mkdir srcextract)
Bash(if not exist srcmodels mkdir srcmodels)
Bash(if not exist srcutils mkdir srcutils)
Bash(if not exist tests mkdir tests)
Bash(if not exist examples mkdir examples)
